tool_description: Access endless trivia question and answers. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/trivia.
title: Trivia by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/trivia
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trivia-by-api-ninjas.p.rapidapi.com/v1/trivia"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trivia-by-api-ninjas.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: How many results to return. Must be between **1** and **30**. Default is **1**.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description:
Category of trivia. Possible values are: 

**artliterature
language
sciencenature
general
fooddrink
peopleplaces
geography
historyholidays
entertainment
toysgames
music
mathematics
religionmythology
sportsleisure**

utterances.utterance: Can you give me a trivia question about science and nature?
I need 5 trivia questions about history and holidays.
What is a trivia question from the entertainment category?
Give me 10 trivia questions about geography.
Can you provide a trivia question about food and drink?
I want 3 trivia questions related to music.
What is a trivia question about art and literature?
Give me 7 trivia questions about sports and leisure.
Can you provide a trivia question about religion and mythology?
I need 2 trivia questions about toys and games.
